content: with long tail cast knit to bor on method if knitting on long circular round 2 - k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k2 needles for magic loop method divide sm knit to next marker sm knit to bor sts up evenly on both side of needles round 3 - k2 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 k4 p2 1/1 join in the round and place marker for lc 1/1 rc p2 k2 sm knit to next marker sm bor knit to bor round 4 - k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k2 round 1 - *k2 tbl p1* repeat to end sm knit to next marker sm knit to bor repeat round 1 for a total of 14 rnds or until your cuff measures 3 5 cm repeat rounds 1-4 of the thumb increase section 6 times total ending with a round 4 knit 2 rnds you should now have 15 16 17 thumb sts page 6 © maven crafted designs iris mitts finishing the thumb pick up the 15 16 17 thumb sts that were put on hold plus pick up and knit 5 6 7 sts separating the thumb along the thumb co edge to close the gap you should have a total of 20 22 24 sts on k2 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 k4 p2 1/1 rc your needles 1/1 lc p2 knit 2 remove marker place 15 16 17 thumb sts on scrap yarn or round 1 - k1 k2tog knit to the last 3 sts holder co 3 4 5 sts using the ssk k1 2 sts decreased 18 20 22 backwards loop method remove next marker knit to bor remaining rounds 2 - 4 knit continue with the following rounds round 5 - k1 k2tog knit to last 3 sts ssk k1 2 sts decreased 16 18 20 sts round 1 - k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 remaining knit to bor rounds 6 & 8 - knit round 2 - k2 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 k4 rounds 9 & 10 - *k1tbl p1* repeat from * p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 knit to bor to end round 3 - k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 bobble in pattern with a loose bind off knit to bor weave in all ends and block to your round 4 - k2 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 k4 preference p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 knit to bor repeat rounds 1-4 two more times then repeat round 1 once more you should have a total of 15 cable repeats in total throughout the glove ribbing knit 1 round *k2 tbl p1* repeat from * until you reach the bor repeat this round for three more rounds then bobble in pattern with a loose bind off page 7 © maven crafted designs iris mitts share your work if you have any questions please feel free to reach out to me please do not
